amendment.description: Amendment to increase funding for the Corps of Engineers Operation and Maintenance account (harbor maintenance) by $57.6 million and reduce funding for Nuclear Energy Programs by $73,309,100.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Corps of Engineers Operation and Maintenance by $57.6 million and to reduce funding for Nuclear Energy Programs by $73,309,100.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hahn amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 137 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Hahn.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hahn amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 137 (Roll no. 372).
